attributes.action: Stop MP,s Members of Parliament, from being allowed to have second or more jobs.
attributes.additional_details: Always a possibility that being a paid consultant or working for another organisation there could be a risk of conflict of interest. So to avoid this MP'S should not be able work elsewhere or any paid work other than possibility of some unpaid charity work. Also being a Member of Parliament is full time and on a full time salary, so therefore shouldn't do other paid work or work elsewhere.
attributes.background: MP'S are paid a large salary plus expenses and being a Member of Parliament should be classed as full time employment and MPs should not be able work elsewhere as risk of conflict of interest.
